body.name: Handheld Steamer for Clothes-1200W Powerful Continuous Steam, 2 Modes for Wet and Dry Ironing, 15S Fast Heat-up, Portable Removing Fabric Wrinkles for Travel/Home/Dorm

Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 21 hrs 38 mins
features: 2 in 1 Wet&Dry Ironing: This clothes steamer features 1200w and 302°F continuous steam is ready in 15 seconds. Its 75% larger diamond coated ceramic soleplate and 2 modes for you to choose from, with only one button to control for steaming, no matter for wet steaming or dry ironing, it performances.

Compact Design: This garment steamer has an sleek and solid design, the mainbody is 1.65lbs(filled with water), and slim 10x4.7x2 inches, portable and lightweight to use for at home, college dorm and on the go.

Safe and No Leaking: As a portable travel steamer, it's safe to use in any angles, no need to worry about water leaking. 90° rotating head is designed for various operation positions, no matter for vertical steaming and horizental ironing, it does the job.

Essential Accessories Included: Enhance your steaming experience with the included accessories for a wide range of fabrics, cushion brush could help when fabric is delicate; lint brush help to clean clothes before steaming. Silicone mat offers a place to lay aside the hand steamer when you need to stop, and a bonus water tank reduces constantly refilling.

Perfect Service: All products enjoy 1 year after sale with 24h friendly customer service. NOTE: Only for 120V use, please use a transformer and an adapter when use in 220V outlet to avoid product damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best steamer I’ve ever owned
reviews.reviewText: This product me appear to be a little more expensive than others but I do believe you get what you pay for. This is one of the best garment steamer’s I’ve ever used in very easy for use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great steamer, perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: I always have to take a steamer with me when I travel because I despise wrinkly clothes. This is a good size for travel and take up little room in my luggage due to the shape. Great at getting the wrinkles out and it’s easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This work out just perfect loved it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love using this steamer. It is so easy to use and makes my clothes look so good. I think this one is so fancy and works well for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steamy Wonder in a Compact Package! ☁️👗
reviews.reviewText: Hey wrinkle warriors and on-the-go fashionistas! 💖 Just had to spill the steamy love for this super compact and portable garment steamer – a whopping 5 stars for compactness and portability alone! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️This little powerhouse is a game-changer for anyone in the wrinkle war! 💪🔥 The compact design is a dream – it's like having a mini magic wand in my hands. Perfect for quick fixes on the fly.The effectiveness matches the convenience! 💨👗 Despite its size, it delivers a powerful punch to wrinkles, leaving my clothes looking fresh and polished.If you're on the hunt for a garment steamer that deserves a standing ovation for its compactness and portability, this one is a winner. Say goodbye to wrinkles and hello to steamy perfection! 🌬️👚Happy steaming, fabulous fashionistas! 💃✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great but a little heavy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this both as a travel and hoe steamer because I loathe ironing. I was happy that the water holder comes out for easy filling and refilling, and thus can be easily emptied out to be TSA compliant for flying. It's a bit heavy for a carryon bag but really packs a punch and worked beautifully on a cotton and polyester dress I have as well as things like cotton skirts. I will use this often and love that it came with a heat resistant pad to let it cool off on without damaging any surfaces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Compact and easy to use. Works great. Comes with 2 water cartridges. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is a little heavy
reviews.reviewText: It does a great job in getting out wrinkles and heats up fast. What I don’t like is there isn’t an on/off button.
